(u.userId=#keyWord# OR u.userNickname LIKE concat('%', #keyWord#, '%'))
u.userGroup=#userGroup#

b.logTime $orderRule$ ,
u.keyId asc LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#

sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_group (parentGroup,groupId,groupName,maxCount,currentCount,groupLevel,groupMode,extMsg,createdTime,createdUser,descMsg,groupState,modifiedTime) VALUES (#parentGroup#,#groupId#,#groupName#,#maxCount#,#currentCount#,#groupLevel#,#groupMode#,#extMsg#,#createdTime#,#createdUser#,#descMsg#,#groupState#,#modifiedTime#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId

insert into t_group_user (groupId,groupName,userId,userName,userNickname,userLevel,playCount1,playCount2,createdTime,inviterId,userRole,userGroup,credit,promoterLevel,promoterId1,promoterId2,promoterId3,promoterId4,refuseInvite) VALUES (#groupId#,#groupName#,#userId#,#userName#,#userNickname#,#userLevel#,#playCount1#,#playCount2#,#createdTime#,#inviterId#,#userRole#,#userGroup#,#credit#,#promoterLevel#,#promoterId1#,#promoterId2#,#promoterId3#,#promoterId4#,#refuseInvite#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId

insert into t_group_review (userName,currentOperator,groupName,operateTime,userId,groupId,reviewMode,currentState,createdTime,contentMsg) VALUES (#userName#,#currentOperator#,#groupName#,#operateTime#,#userId#,#groupId#,#reviewMode#,#currentState#,#createdTime#,#contentMsg#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId

SELECT * FROM t_table_record WHERE tableId=#tableId# ORDER BY playNo ASC;

SELECT t2.userId as userId,COALESCE(t1.count1,0) as count1,t2.count1 AS count2 FROM ( SELECT userId,COUNT(*) as count1 FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND createdTime>=#startDate# AND createdTime<=#endDate# AND isWinner >0 GROUP BY userId ORDER BY count1 DESC ) t1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT userId,COUNT(*) as count1 FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND createdTime>=#startDate# AND createdTime<=#endDate# GROUP BY userId ) t2 ON t1.userId=t2.userId ORDER BY t1.count1 DESC,t2.count1 DESC LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_group_table_config (parentGroup,groupId,tableName,tableMode,modeMsg,gameType,payType,gameCount,playerCount,descMsg,tableOrder,playCount,createdTime,creditMsg,goldMsg) VALUES (#parentGroup#,#groupId#,#tableName#,#tableMode#,#modeMsg#,#gameType#,#payType#,#gameCount#,#playerCount#,#descMsg#,#tableOrder#,#playCount#,#createdTime#,#creditMsg#,#goldMsg#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group_table_config SET configState="0" WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=#parentGroup#

UPDATE t_group_table_config
tableName=#tableName#
tableMode=#tableMode#
modeMsg=#modeMsg#
gameType=#gameType#
payType=#payType#
gameCount=#gameCount#
playerCount=#playerCount#
descMsg=#descMsg#
tableOrder=#tableOrder#
playCount=#playCount#
configState=#configState#
createdTime=#createdTime#
creditMsg=#creditMsg#
goldMsg=#goldMsg#
WHERE keyId=#keyId#
UPDATE t_group_user SET groupName=#groupName# WHERE groupId=#groupId#
UPDATE t_group_user SET refuseInvite=#status# WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND userId=#uid#

UPDATE t_group_user
groupName=#groupName#
userNickname=#userNickname#
userLevel=#userLevel#
playCount1=#playCount1#
playCount2=#playCount2#
userRole=#userRole#
userGroup=#userGroup#
promoterLevel=#promoterLevel#
promoterId1=#promoterId1#
promoterId2=#promoterId2#
promoterId3=#promoterId3#
promoterId4=#promoterId4#
creditCommissionRate=#creditCommissionRate#
refuseInvite=#refuseInvite#
ext=#ext#
creditLock=#creditLock#
WHERE keyId =#keyId#

UPDATE t_group_review
userName=#userName#
operateTime=#operateTime#
currentOperator=#currentOperator#
groupName=#groupName#
currentState=#currentState#
WHERE keyId =#keyId#
UPDATE t_group SET currentCount=currentCount+#count# WHERE parentGroup=#parentGroup# AND groupId=#groupId#

UPDATE t_group
groupId=#groupId#
parentGroup=#parentGroup#
groupName=#groupName#
maxCount=#maxCount#
currentCount=#currentCount#
groupLevel=#groupLevel#
groupMode=#groupMode#
extMsg=#extMsg#
descMsg=#descMsg#
groupState=#groupState#
modifiedTime=#modifiedTime#
content=#content#
WHERE keyId=#keyId#

overTime>=#startDate#
overTime<=#endDate#
playedBureau>=#playedBureau#
playedBureau = #pb#

playedBureau>#playedBureau#

userGroup = #userGroup#
userId = #userId#
promoterId1 = #promoterId1#
promoterId2 = #promoterId2#
promoterId3 = #promoterId3#
promoterId4 = #promoterId4#
) AND tu.createdTime >= #startDate# AND tu.createdTime <= #endDate# AND gt.keyId = tu.tableNo AND gt.currentState in ('2','4','5')
gt.tableId = #tableId#
gt.type = #type#
ORDER BY tu.createdTime DESC LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#

userId = #userId#
promoterId1 = #promoterId1#

promoterId3 = #promoterId3#
promoterId4 = #promoterId4#

gt.tableId = #tableId#
gt.type = #type#

userGroup=#userGroup#
limit 1

SELECT t2.userGroup, COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) mycount FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 AND playedBureau>0 AND currentState in ('2','4','5') AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.groupId =#groupId# group by t2.userGroup

SELECT t2.userId, COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) mycount FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 AND playedBureau>0 AND currentState in ('2','4','5') AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.userGroup=#userGroup# AND t2.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.userId in($userIds$) AND t2.userId in($userIds$) GROUP BY t2.userId

SELECT t2.userId, COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) mycount FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.playResult>0 AND t1.isWinner = "1" AND t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 and playedBureau>0 AND currentState in ('2','4','5') AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.userGroup=#userGroup# AND t2.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.userId in($userIds$) AND t2.userId in($userIds$) GROUP BY t2.userId

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) mycount FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 and playedBureau>0 AND currentState in ('2','4','5') AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.userGroup=#userGroup# AND t2.groupId =#groupId#

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) mycount FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.playResult>0 AND t1.isWinner = "1" AND t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 and playedBureau>0 AND currentState in ('2','4','5') AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.userGroup=#userGroup# AND t2.groupId =#groupId#

userId != outUser
sqlMap.select: select * from t_group where groupId=#groupId# AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# limit 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group_user SET credit = credit + #credit# WHERE keyId =#keyId# AND credit + #credit# >= 0
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ (groupId,optUserId,userId,credit,curCredit,type,flag,createdTime,userGroup,mode) VALUES (#groupId#,#optUserId#,#userId#,#credit#,(select coalesce(credit,0) from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId# AND userId=#userId#),#type#,#flag#,now(),#userGroup#,#mode#)
sqlMap.select:
select u.keyId,u.groupId,u.userId,u.userLevel,u.userRole,u.userGroup,u.credit, b.headimgurl,b.`name` as userName,b.isOnLine,b.sex,b.playingTableId as tableId from t_group_user u,user_inf b where b.userId = u.userId
(u.userId=#keyWord# OR u.userNickname LIKE concat('%', #keyWord#, '%'))
u.userGroup=#userGroup#
AND u.groupId=#groupId# ORDER BY
credit $creditOrder$ ,
(CASE WHEN u.userRole>=10 THEN 2 ELSE u.userRole END) asc, b.isOnLine desc, u.keyId asc LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#

select log.userId, log.optUserId, log.createdTime, log.credit, u.name as optUserName, u2.name as userName from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ log force index(index_all), user_inf u, user_inf u2 where log.groupId=#groupId# AND log.type=#type# AND log.createdTime >= #startDate# AND log.createdTime <= #endDate# AND log.mode = 1
(log.optUserId=#keyWord# or log.userId=#keyWord#)
log.optUserId=#keyWord#
log.userId=#keyWord#
log.credit > 0
log.credit < 0
(log.userGroup = #userGroup# or log.userId = #self# or optUserId = #self#)
log.userGroup = #userGroup#
AND u.userId = log.optUserId AND u2.userId = log.userId ORDER BY log.keyId desc LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#

select COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ as log force index(index_all) where log.groupId=#groupId# AND log.type=#type# AND log.createdTime >= #startDate# AND log.createdTime <= #endDate# AND log.mode = 1
(log.optUserId=#keyWord# or log.userId=#keyWord#)
log.optUserId=#keyWord#
log.userId=#keyWord#
log.credit > 0
log.credit < 0
(log.userGroup = #userGroup# or log.userId = #self# or optUserId = #self#)
log.userGroup = #userGroup#

select COUNT(*) from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ as log where log.groupId=#groupId# AND log.createdTime >= #startDate# AND log.createdTime <= #endDate# AND (log.optUserId=#keyWord# or log.userId=#keyWord#)

SELECT gu.*, u.name as userName, u.headimgurl FROM t_group_user gu, user_inf u WHERE gu.groupId = #groupId# AND u.userId = gu.userId
(gu.userId = #keyWord# OR gu.userNickname LIKE concat('%', #keyWord#, '%'))
gu.userGroup = #userGroup#
ORDER BY(CASE WHEN gu.userRole>=10 THEN 1 ELSE gu.userRole END) ASC , gu.credit desc LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_group_user du, t_group_user fu SET du.credit = du.credit + #credit#, fu.credit = fu.credit - #credit# WHERE fu.groupId = #groupId# AND fu.userId = #fromUserId# AND fu.credit >= #credit# AND du.groupId = #groupId# AND du.userId = #destUserId#

UPDATE t_group_user du, t_group_user fu SET du.credit = du.credit + #credit#, fu.creditPurse = fu.creditPurse - #credit# WHERE fu.groupId = #groupId# AND fu.userId = #fromUserId# AND fu.creditPurse >= #credit# AND du.groupId = #groupId# AND du.userId = #destUserId#

UPDATE t_group_user du, t_group_user fu SET du.tempCredit = du.tempCredit + #credit#, fu.credit = fu.credit - #credit# WHERE fu.groupId = #groupId# AND fu.userId = #fromUserId# AND fu.credit >= #credit# AND du.groupId = #groupId# AND du.userId = #destUserId#

UPDATE t_group_user du, t_group_user fu SET du.tempCredit = du.tempCredit + #credit#, fu.creditPurse = fu.creditPurse - #credit# WHERE fu.groupId = #groupId# AND fu.userId = #fromUserId# AND fu.creditPurse >= #credit# AND du.groupId = #groupId# AND du.userId = #destUserId#
sqlMap.select:
select COALESCE(SUM(credit),0) from t_group_user where groupId = #groupId#
userGroup = #userGroup#

select userGroup, count(keyId) as commissionCount, sum(credit) as commissionCredit, count(DISTINCT optUserId) as memberCount from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ where groupId=#groupId# AND type=#type# AND userId=#userId# AND createdTime >= #startDate# AND createdTime <= #endDate# GROUP BY userGroup ORDER BY userGroup asc

select sum(credit) as sumCredit from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ where groupId=#groupId# AND type=#type# AND userId=#userId#
userGroup=#userGroup#
AND createdTime >= #startDate# AND createdTime <= #endDate#

SELECT t2.userGroup as userGroup, COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) as zjs FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user$ t2 WHERE t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 AND playedBureau>0 AND currentState="2" AND type = 2 AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.groupId =#groupId# group by t2.userGroup

select log.optUserId as userId, sum(log.credit) as commissionCredit, count(log.userId) as commissionCount, u.headimgurl, u.name from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ log, user_inf u where log.groupId=#groupId#
(log.optUserId=#keyWord# OR u.name LIKE concat('%', #keyWord#, '%'))
log.userGroup=#userGroup#
AND log.type=#type# AND log.userId=#userId# AND log.createdTime >= #startDate# AND log.createdTime <= #endDate# AND u.userId=log.optUserId GROUP BY log.optUserId ORDER BY commissionCredit desc LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#

select count(log.optUserId) from t_group_credit_log$gpSeq$ log, user_inf u where log.groupId=#groupId#
(log.optUserId=#keyWord# OR u.name LIKE concat('%', #keyWord#, '%'))
log.userGroup=#userGroup#
AND log.type=#type# AND log.userId=#userId# AND log.createdTime >= #startDate# AND log.createdTime <= #endDate# AND u.userId=log.optUserId GROUP BY log.optUserId

SELECT t2.userId as userId, COALESCE(COUNT(t1.tableNo),0) as zjs FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND currentCount>0 AND playedBureau>0 AND currentState="2" AND type = 2 AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.groupId =#groupId# group by t2.userId
select sum(credit) as sumCredit from t_group_user where groupId=#groupId# AND userGroup=#userGroup#
SELECT groupId FROM t_group WHERE parentGroup=#parentGroup#
SELECT * FROM t_group_table_config WHERE configState="1" AND parentGroup=#parentGroup# ORDER BY keyId DESC limit 1;

select COALESCE(count(gu.keyId),0) from t_group_user gu, user_inf u where gu.groupId = #groupId# AND gu.userRole = 2 AND gu.credit <= 0 AND u.userId = gu.userId AND u.logTime <= #endDate# AND u.playingTableId <= 0

select gu.userId, u.name as userName, u.headimgurl from t_group_user gu, user_inf u where gu.groupId = #groupId# AND gu.userRole = 2 AND gu.credit <= 0 AND u.userId = gu.userId AND u.logTime <= #endDate# AND u.playingTableId <= 0 LIMIT #startNo#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.delete: delete gu.* FROM t_group_user gu , user_inf u WHERE gu.groupId = #groupId# AND gu.userRole = 2 AND gu.credit <= 0 AND gu.userId in ($userIds$) AND u.userId = gu.userId AND u.playingTableId <= 0
sqlMap.select: select * from t_group_review where groupId=#groupId# AND userId=#userId# AND currentState="0"
select count(1) from t_group where parentGroup = #groupId# AND groupState >= 0

SELECT t2.userGroup, COALESCE(COUNT(1),0) zjsCount, COALESCE(sum(case when t1.playResult>0 AND t1.isWinner = 1 then 1 else 0 end),0) as dyjCount FROM t_table_user$gpSeq$ t1, t_group_user t2 WHERE t1.groupId =#groupId# AND t1.tableNo IN( SELECT keyId FROM t_group_table WHERE groupId=#groupId# AND overTime>= #startDate# AND overTime<= #endDate# AND currentState in ('2','4','5') AND currentCount>0 AND playedBureau>0 ) AND t1.userId = t2.userId AND t2.groupId =#groupId# group by t2.userGroup

select * from robot_credit_config
groupId = #groupId#
enable=#enable#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_group_fake_table (configId,parentGroup,groupId,tableName,tableMode,modeMsg,gameType,payType,playedBureau,gameCount,overCount,playerCount,descMsg,tableOrder,playCount,createdTime,creditMsg,goldMsg,roundRefrshTime) VALUES (#configId#,#parentGroup#,#groupId#,#tableName#,#tableMode#,#modeMsg#,#gameType#,#payType#,#playedBureau#,#gameCount#,#overCount#,#playerCount#,#descMsg#,#tableOrder#,#playCount#,#createdTime#,#creditMsg#,#goldMsg#,#roundRefrshTime#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS keyId
sqlMap.select: select keyId, roundRefrshTime, playedBureau, overCount, playerCount from t_group_fake_table where hiding = 0;

select * from t_group_fake_table where parentGroup = #groupId#
gameType=#gameType#
tableName=#tableName#
limit #startNo#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.update: update t_group_fake_table set playedBureau = #playedBureau#, roundRefrshTime = #roundRefrshTime# where keyId = #keyId#;
sqlMap.select: select * from t_group_fake_table_headimage where fakeTableId = #fakeTableId#;
sqlMap.update: update t_group_fake_table_headimage set fakeTableId = #fakeTableId# where keyId in ($keyIds$);
update t_group_fake_table_headimage set fakeTableId = 0 where fakeTableId = #fakeTableIds#;
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM t_group_fake_table WHERE keyId in ($keyIdStr$)
sqlMap.update: update t_group_fake_table set hiding=case when hiding=1 then 0 else 1 end where keyId=#keyId#;
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM t_group_fake_table WHERE parentGroup = #groupId#
configId = #configId#
gameType in ($gameTypes$)
sqlMap.update: update t_group_fake_table set overCount=#overCount#, playerCount=#playerCount#,tableName=#tableName#, gameCount=#gameCount# where configId=#configId#;
